body.name: FRIZCOL 3-in-1 Camping Fan - Portable Fan Rechargeable - 20000mAh 9-Inch Battery Powered Fan(60Hrs) - USB Fan with Light & Remote for Indoor, Outdoor e.g. Tent, Travel, BBQ, Fishing, Jobsite

features: Versatile Portable Fan - Cooling Anywhere: Get a comfortable and convenient outdoor experience with this 3-in-1 camping fan, light, and power bank. With easy remote/button control for even air circulation, it's perfect for your camping adventures or home use. Don't miss out!

Easy Operation & Long-lasting Power: You can enjoy the fan with ease using the remote control. With a 20000mAh rechargeable battery, this fan provides 15-60 hours of cooling relief without needing an electrical outlet. Fast-charging Type-C/USB port included.

Adjustable Tent Fan with Bright LED Lights: Customize your outdoor experience with 45°/90° automatic oscillation, adjustable 270° direction, 4 wind speeds, and 3 brightness levels. 8 top-quality LED lights brighten up your reading/working. 4 power indicator lights for easy monitoring. Enjoy the great outdoors in comfort and style.
Sleep in Peace & Timer: With its whisper-quiet brushless motor and a convenient auto-off timer, you can set it for 1H/2H/4H/8H and enjoy a peaceful sleep with the lights turned off for added comfort.

Foldable Hook & Comfortable Handle: Convenient built-in hook to hang on tent/tree branches. Stable base for use on desk, RV, office, etc. Both indoor & outdoor use as a desk fan. Wide handle for easy lifting, no dropping.
Dependable Support: Enjoy peace of mind with our 3-year after-sales service. Our team is available 24/7 for any questions or concerns.
body.description: Frizcol Battery Operated Camping Fan Cooling & Running Long- Great Camping Essentials！！！ Get a rechargeable tent fan that doubles as a camping light, and power bank, with a 20,000mAh battery and a foldable hook. Up to 60 hours of battery life. Stay cool and stylish all summer long. Ideal gift for dad, boyfriend, or fishing enthusiasts. Battery Capacity: 20000mAh Running Time: Last for 15-60Hrs (200Hrs for only LED Light) 4 Fan Speeds: Low-Natural-Mid-High (Remote/Button Control) 4 Timer Settings: 1H-2H-4H-8H 3 Brightness Levels : Low-Mid-High USB Output: Charge your Phone Adjustment Angle: 45°/90° Auto-oscillation & 270° Manual Pivot Hook Design: Foldable Hook

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Frizcol is a top brand for cooling fan products since 1985. They produce high-quality fans and portable coolers for outdoor use. Today, Frizcol offers a range of products, known for their quality, durability, and innovation. You'll receive: Fan*1; Remote control*1; USB-USB C charging cable*1; Instruction manual*1 Application: Camping\Hiking\BBQ\Fishing\Beaches\Parks\Tents\RVs\Cabins Frizcol Battery Operated Camping Fan Cooling & Running Long- Great Camping Essentials！！！ Get a rechargeable tent fan that doubles as a camping light, and power bank, with a 20,000mAh battery and a foldable hook. Up to 60 hours of battery life. Stay cool and stylish all summer long. Ideal gift for dad, boyfriend, or fishing enthusiasts. Battery Capacity: 20000mAh Running Time: Last for 15-60Hrs (200Hrs for only LED Light) 4 Fan Speeds: Low-Natural-Mid-High (Remote/Button Control) 4 Timer Settings: 1H-2H-4H-8H 3 Brightness Levels : Low-Mid-High USB Output: Charge your Phone Adjustment Angle: 45°/90° Auto-oscillation & 270° Manual Pivot Hook Design: Foldable Hook

Powerful Brushless Motor It is more efficient and durable than traditional brushed motors, allowing the fan to run longer on batteries and withstand outdoor use. A reliable choice for keeping you cool during camping trips 4 Fan Speeds & Timer Settings 4 fan speed setting. Run for 15-60 hours (depending on the wind speed). You can set a timer among 1H-2H-4H-8H. All-round Cooling & Remote Control A remote control for anywhere you go, easily oscillating 45°/90° left and right and adjusting 270° up and down, no more than 30 ft away.

Emergency Power Bank It can charge your phone with an USB output port, making it a great addition to your camping, picnic, fishing and other emergency situations. Bright Led Camping Light 3 level brightness settings to light up your tent . 8 Bright LED Light to protect your eyesight when reading outside in the night. Foldable Hook Design There is a upside-down hanging hook at the bottom of the fan, which you can hang it everywhere. It can aslo be a desk fan on any flat places.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little fan with nice options!
reviews.reviewText: What a Great little fan, it’s fairly powerful for it’s size, and moves quite a bit of air around that can be felt a ways away, I really like the oscillating with the 45 or 90 degree option, and another Great option is that it charges up pretty well while using it, the hook is convenient, and works well on oscillating, the light seems to be fairly bright with 3 different settings though haven’t had much of a chance to use it yet, and the battery life seems pretty good! I would recommend this fan for anyone looking for a quality little rechargeable fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought multiple of these during the summer for the kids summer camp to put in our tents. Worked great. The battery life was better than expected. The size and adjustability was great for inside the tents. Also had minimal noise. We have used them more than we expected and are holding up well. The remote was also a nice little bonus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fan/light compact, able to hang upside down, long lasting fan, bright light, quiet. Well worth the purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works better than expected! I love it
reviews.reviewText: Perfect portable, rechargeable fan.I was looking for a rechargeable fan at a hardware store for $100 and then, happened to run across this on Amazon.This fan kicks out a lot of power! It has 4 speed settings and the remote control works great. There's a spot behind the fan that holds the remote, thank God, or else I would've lost it already. There are other features on the fan that I won't mention, only because I don't use them. This is a wonderful fan to have during a, "hot flash"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Little noisy-battery life is great
reviews.reviewText: This fan is good, however it is a bit noisy. The battery lasts a long time. I like that it has a place to store the remote. The light is very bright.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love how small this is but it works so great at the same time

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Bright and blows awesome air for a battery powered unit
reviews.reviewText: The light on this fan is very bright so if one woke up and needing to "let's say go potty" they would have no problems finding the opening of their tent. The air it blows is just like an electric fan but I think this one tends to be pretty strong air. We used it for about 8 hours the other night and the battery only went down one power so it stays charged for a very long time. I have to give it a 5 star review. It's very nice for the $

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Camping Fan We've Had!
reviews.reviewText: We LOVE this freaking fan. It's incredibly powerful for its size and the battery life is pretty long considering.We've even used this inside our home in our living room - it's THAT good.My husband loves the remote control feature. The light is incredibly bright, allowing it to double as a primary light source while camping. It's easy to charge and while it's kind of bulky, it's still small enough to pack with your gear (for car camping, I wouldn't suggest this for backpacking).
